name: Chronoleaper
description:
One perspective may not be enough. Leap through time and look through different perspectives. Understand the importance of the past and the future. Fight your way through in this turn-based RPG dungeon crawler!

Dungeon Crawler 2023 Game Jam Submission.

When in doubt, just leap through time!

=== Controls ===

Movement: WASDQE or 456789

Inventory: I

Time Leap: Spacebar

Pause: Esc

Interact: Left Click

===========

Currently, there is no possible way to get to the end the intended way due to me forgetting how teleporting works. One missing block was the only thing preventing the players to progress further.

If you find any bugs or any spots you should not be in, please send me a message and I will try to patch it. :)

We hope you enjoy our game! :D We plan to update this project in the future.

Patch v1.0.1: Coming after rating ends. Includes many bug fixes.

Made by 

KillerzScrubbie, meangpu  : Programming

ClairDeLou: Music

MidJourney (AI): Art
